    • Uses of Customer in core.facade

      Methods in core.facade that return Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Customer AdminFacade.viewCustomer(long id) 
      Methods in core.facade that return types with arguments of type Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Customer> AdminFacade.getCustomersCollection()
      This method will allow to administrator to look through all the customers;
      Methods in core.facade with parameters of type Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AdminFacade.createCustomer(Customer customer)
      This method creates a new customer record in the database.
      void AdminFacade.removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      This method deletes the customer and his purchase history completely.
      void AdminFacade.updateCustomerExceptname(Customer customer, long customerOldID)
      This method updates all customer parameters, except of his name.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Customer> CustomerDBDAO.getAllCustomers()

      Methods in dbdao.core with parameters of type Customer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CustomerDBDAO.createCustomer(Customer customer)
      This method is used to create a new customer records in the customer table.
      void CustomerDBDAO.removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      Use this method to delete all the customer information from the database.
      void CustomerDBDAO.updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      This method updates customer records in the database.
      void CustomerDBDAO.updateCustomerExceptName(Customer customer)
      This method is a version of updateCustomer() method, except that caller can't change customer's name.
